Changelog
=========

1.2 - 2009-02-11
----------------

- Update patch to not apply when Zope version already passes on the entry id
  to the event log itself.
  [mj]

1.1 - 2009-01-22
----------------

- Vastly simplify the monkey patch.
  [mj]

1.0 - 2009-01-22
----------------

- Initial release
  [stefan]
